title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 2
description: Our heroes take one step closer toward their joined destinies, and learn the truth about the woods outside Kepler in their own ways. Aubrey visits the Lodge. Ned shoots a fan film. Duck gets a visit from an old friend.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
